    GameCharacter
    Note that this file cannot be named "Character", because that clashes with Java's Character.
    Mage

    NPC  
    Player
    This is a controllable character with a specified starting inventory.

    A thief playable character in TrollQuest
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CharAnimations
    Enum representing the five different animations a player can take.
    Creature.Stat
    Enumeration of every STAT required by the system specification.
    GameCharacter.Gender
    Record the specific gender of the character
    GameCharacterTypes
    Enumeration of all the character types.
